hi.

I'm using a MVC application.

I want to check the following path:
Login - navigate to a specific JSP - ask for customer details.

I want to check the customer details I got, since it depends on the 
user profile.

I tried to check with "Cactus", but it looks like there isn't 
a "state", means, after login, when running the navigate step, I lost 
the prev session.

I bevelive I should use diff "testXXX" (in same class), since I need 
to use diff "beginXXX".

How can I check this issue ?

Thanks.

Noam.
